name: Shiverspike
entries: You gain a +1 to attack rolls and damage rolls with this weapon.

Whenever you would take or deal Cold damage, you gain Temporary Hit points equal to your Proficiency Bonus, as Ice crystals coalesce around you. Whenever you would hit a creature this weapon, you can remove any Temporary Hit points you have to cause the attack to deal additional cold damage equal to the temporary hit points removed.
